title: I have a very serious request for the people who work on the Client of League of Legends.
body:
Dear People who've worked perfectly on the client despite all the hate they got during it's early days,

* Give us a screenshot button so during champion select I could screenshot and send the picture to the Riot Games Customer Support to show them the chat during champion select in the picture as a proof that X person was threatening of trolling or four premades against you tell you to switch or else they will accuse you of trolling etc...


* If you're scared that there's no point because those screenshots could potentially be photo-shopped then make it so that those screenshots are saved IN THE CLIENT and give us the option to send it to you (Riot Games Customer Support) directly via the CLIENT so you can punish them.


* A rough idea would be to let the system on your end of the customer site to detect that the screenshot was sent by the player via the *CLIENT*. Make it so the screenshots taken through the client can be the only ones to exist in the client, this way none would be able to send you a photo-shopped version of a screenshot during champion select to abuse this.

#That is the only actual solution for the toxic people during champion select I can find that cannot be abused.

It is 2018 Riot Games, no more joking, we need to end toxicity in this game as a community.

#Justice needs to be served

replies.body: We're working on making things better with reports, and figuring out ways that pre/post game chat can be included. Until then, feel free to take your own screenshots using whatever method (printscreen, Gyazo, etc) and shoot those over in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to have the player behavior agents take a look.

Alright good luck & will do! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Are you just gonna ignore the fact that a support agent just told you they're working on a system to include this? patience bruh.
51 views...dear players come on we can do this, just comment on this thread, at least state your opinions, this one idea needs to be heard by the team of Riot Games. {{sticker:sg-janna}}

Its been 7 minutes since this thread was made and it's already gotten 25 views, please people do not ignore this, let us work as a community and get this idea noticed by the team of Riot Games, the community of this game can be improved this way.

* We won't get as much trolls as we get right now during champion select screen who threaten us to switch roles or else they will run it down mid making you dodge and wasting time of 9 innocent players because one of person's threat to ruin a precious fun match of League of Legends..


* We won't get trolls who are premade of 4 who tell you to switch roles or pick X champion or else they will accuse of you being toxic and trolling and then either giving you two options: Either you dodge or go in to the match constantly being flamed by the premades on your team, who sabotage you into fights and then just leave you alone to die... and after the match ends...everyone just reports you..

* I know Riot Tantram has said that 9 reports = the power of 1 report but getting reported multiple times after a match by the ones who were in THE MATCH counts as 9 reports which ends up putting you high on the Radar of the punishment system....which ends up punishing you harder if you had to dodge because of the situations said above which in turn gives you a 20 minute punishment for dodging a champion select screen which also makes you waste others time...which just sucks overall...
